raiseCommit(bytes32).notice: Increase collateral and/or update commitment during commit phase.         Allows a bidder to raise their bid by topping up collateral and updating the commit hash.

userdoc.notice: Permissionless, second-price sealed-bid auction for projecting the loudest voice on-chain.         Each auction round lasts 24h: 12h commit, 12h reveal. Winner's post is projected for 24h.         No owner/admin, ETH only, fully decentralized.
